name: Crazy City Biker Stunt Rider 3D: Extreme Stunts
name_original: Crazy City Biker Stunt Rider 3D: Extreme Stunts
description:
The simplest and amazing bike race that gives you the taste of realistic and crazy stunts and actions of adrenaline rush. Crazy city biker stunts is one of the best scooter driving game with the thrill and excitement of moto racing across the lush city roads. Enter the world of daredevil stunts where breathtaking visuals and HD Graphics make your crazy to play for long hours without missing any update.

Addictive game play where at each stage you face challenges and amazing obstacles in a fantasy city environment.Enjoy free ride and rule the city with your excellent motorcycle driving skills. Become a talented motorbike driver in an exciting open world racing simulator where speed and action is your most important weapon.

Be fast as much as you can and prove yourself as one of the master bike driver where no one can beat you.The realistic city view and thrilling racing stunts make the game more challenging and addictive for race lovers. Dodge your rivals and perform daredevil stunts in the dangerous risky tracks to prove yourself.

Are you ready for a wild ride in a free landing track where whole paths and street roads are made just for race? Choose among exciting cool bikes made especially for the excellent racing experience.Drive faster and unlock bikes for more enjoyment.

The Crazy City Biker Stunt 3D Provides you a chance to drive cool bikes and play free the best bike race and stunt game with simple and easy to play controls.

GAME FEATURES:

- Easy, simple and realistic controls
- Awesome bikes to unlock with different physics
- Unique racing and stunt experience
- Stunning 3D Graphics
- Excellent bike driving simulation
- Addictive game play with smooth controls

Feel free to give us your valuable feedback and don’t forget to like us on Facebook @
